comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: B-25G serial 42-64816 was transferred to the 498th Bomb Squadron "Green Falcons" from the 38th BG on 26 August 1944; she served less than two months before being sent to the Service Command as war weary. The bird is seen here stripped of her paint and armament, converted to a 'fat cat' - and literally nicknamed "War Weary."
